title: The Moon Hunters
description: For fans of The Hunger Games, Divergent, and The Gender Game comes a captivating new story like no other.The Pestilence sweeps the globe with terrifying speed. A group of survivors finds an island sanctuary.Three generations later, no one has heard from the outside world in years. The old radio only crackles with static. The Pestilence either finished its job or the world tore itself apart.In the Village of Lehom, Leilani has been called to court as a Virtue by the King. Going to court means losing her independence and self-respect. Unfortunately, she doesnâ€™t have a choice.Leilani decides to take a stand; the King be damned. She plans a daring escape and sets in motion a series of events that will shake the foundation of her village and the island to its core.
author: Anya Pavelle
